title: He's For The Streets
itunes:title: He's For The Streets
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 33 year old single woman and my older sister just married a man that’s for the streets. I know you’re going to say I need to mind my business, but my brother-in-law is a whore. When I graduated from college 10 years ago, I went to a party and he was one of my classmate’s boyfriends at that time. I was annoyed by him flirting and staring at me all night.......................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 33 year old single woman and my older sister just married a man that’s for the streets. I know you’re going to say I need to mind my business, but my brother-in-law is a whore. When I graduated from college 10 years ago, I went to a party and he was one of my classmate’s boyfriends at that time. I was annoyed by him flirting and staring at me all night.......................................
